overview: Shovel Headed Tour Machine: Live At Wacken & Other Assorted Atrocities is a live DVD album by American thrash metal band Exodus. It was recorded at Exodus's July 2008 performance at the Wacken Open Air Festival in Germany. The set contains 3 discs, the first disc containing the live Wacken performance, disc 2 being the audio CD of the concert, and disc three being a documentary of the band in the last 5 years of their career, including the recording of Shovel Headed Kill Machine and The Atrocity Exhibition... Exhibit A.
title: Exodus: Shovel Headed Tour Machine
